snippet: A man who had fired a gun inside a ticketing area at Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston was killed after being confronted by a Department of Homeland Security agent, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Unidentified man who fired gun inside ticketing area at Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston is killed after confrontation with Department of Homeland Security agent.
lead_paragraph: A man who had fired a gun inside a ticketing area at Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston was killed after being confronted by a Department of Homeland Security agent, the police said Thursday.

headline.seo: Texas: Gunman Is Killed at Airport
headline.main: Texas: Gunman Is Killed at Airport
headline.print_headline: Texas: Gunman Is Killed at Airport
